case.name: Selected
case.description: AE86 is a CAR! A car has joined the strip poker game! A literal car!

case.name: Track change
case.description: Instead of removing clothing, AE86 changes songs on its radio.

case.name: No more songs
case.description: AE86 is "naked" when it can't find a new song to play

case.name: Driving away
case.description: When AE86 finishes "masturbating", it simply drives away.

case.name: Selected: Street
case.description: AE86 is selected on the Street background. Note that players are playing in the middle of the road and may be alarmed.

case.name: Selected: Indoors
case.description: AE86 is selected for an indoors background. Cars are not usually welcome inside.
